subscriptionAlert.noSubDescription: You don't have an active subscription yet. Start your free 15-day trial to explore all platform features and see how they work for your business.
subscriptionAlert.trialDescription: Your trial period has {days} days remaining. Complete your payment to keep uninterrupted access to all services.
subscriptionAlert.renewalDescription: Your yearly subscription expires in {days} days. Renew now to avoid service interruption.
subscriptionAlert.graceDescription: Your subscription payment is overdue. You have {days} days left before access is suspended.
subscriptionAlert.expiredDescription: Your subscription has expired and your access to services has been suspended. Please make a payment to reactivate.
